DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the hypothesis that dietary n-3 PUFA will have a beneficial effect on systemic and local markers of inflammation when combined with traditional, non-surgical periodontal therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Infections: Dietary Regulation of Local and Systemic Inflammatory Responses
